item.title: Interactive Resume Added
item.description: Just added an interractive resume to the “Resume” section of the website. When clicked, you will be transferred to geleus.io where I have set up a terminal-like interactive resume. This was mainly done for fun and education purposes. Feel free to play around with it. Just note, that it is still in the development phase. I will be adding more info to it soon.

item.title: Utah County Health Department Project
item.description: This project is designed to streamline data organization, analysis, and security, ensuring that information remains accurate, accessible, and protected. While specific details remain confidential, this post provides an overview of the key features and technical aspects of the system.

item.title: Update February 2025
item.description: Yes, I’m Alive! Life has been crazy these past couple of years. This post is intended to be an update on my current state of things. Also, I will try to be more consistent with managing my websiteâ€”I know it has been abandoned for a while now. Initially, this website was meant to be my personal space to share academic and personal projects. I always wanted to document, explain, and share my software for aesthetic and professional purposes.

item.title: 2023 â€“ I'm Back!
item.description: Getting back to working on my website. Just finised my general education section last block, so, now I can fully dive into it. So far I’m planning on working more on my personal projects for the portfolio so that I have something to present when I apply for the real job. I’m thinking to dive deeper into databases, APIs and OS. Also, haven’t been using python for A WHILE, gotta refresh it.

item.title: Image Compression Project is Posted
item.description: Just uploaded my Image Compression Project that I did for my Numerical Software Development class. It was implemented using MATLAB programming language.

item.title: Image Compression
item.description: Compressing images using Discrete Cosine Transform (DCT).

item.description: I just updated the UVSim project description and uploaded final version of it to my GitHub.

item.title: Facial Recognition Project is Posted
item.description: Just finished Facial Recognition project. I uploaded it to my Github and posted it’s details on the website.

item.title: Facial Recognition
item.description: AI that recognizes known faces and adds unknown ones to the dataset for further training.

item.title: Working on Facial Recognition
item.description: Currently working on a facial recognition project that is supposed to use a dataset of known faces for recognition and capture unknown faces adding them to the dataset for later training. I’m using an OpenCV library to implement all the features. This is the next project I will be posting.

item.title: Resume is Coming Soon
item.description: Currently working on creating and posting my resume to the website. As of right now I am going to have a “Resume” section in the menu with temporary message.

item.title: Online Groceries Project is Posted
item.description: Just uploaded my Online Groceries project structure and implementation description. Once again, the project was inspired by UVU project which required me to write invoice.py script. I worked on design of reverse program order.py. Here I described the structure of data storage and implementation of order.py as well as invoice.py.

item.title: Online Groceries
item.description: Online order handling system that uses .txt file to structure data and use it later to create an invoice.

item.title: geleus.com = geleus.io
item.description: geleus.com redirects to geleus.io Recently reserved geleus.com domain and set up redirection to this website geleus.io.

item.title: Working on Online Groceries
item.description: Currently working on “Online Groceries” program inspired by UVU class. The idea is to collect items with customer information as you would do when shopping online and create a structure for storage of such data. This data is later being used to create a well structured invoice with items purchased and customers’ information. I’ve already created invoice.py program that stores structured receipt to the order_details.txt (that was an in-class project), now I’m writing a reverse program order.

item.description: Simple search engine for url that can find all links, links to images, count words, display word occurrence table, etc.
